```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

#set wd nd get data

setwd ("/Users/jprout/OneDrive - University of Maryland School of Medicine/R/Evaluation_Blog/_posts/2021-01-18-tidy-tuesday-2021-week-4-kenya-census-2019")

school <- read_csv("-kenya_schools.csv")
#data description
#Table 2.2: Distribution of Population Age 3 Years and Above by School Attendance Status,
#' Area of Residence, Sex, County and Sub-County
#"before C and after C" C= completion

totals <- filter (school, Group == "Total")
```

```{r}

ggplot (totals, aes (x=SubCounty, y = StillinSchool_Perc, label = StillinSchool_Perc )) +
  geom_col () +
  coord_flip ()
```
